derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, from Italian, from archi- 'chief' + -trave from Latin trabs, trab- 'a beam'

means.word_mean: 1. the molding around a door or window
2. the lowest part of an entablature; rests immediately on the capitals of the columns
